name: Omega Drive
effects: Four single attacks (0.27~1.42 each scaling with ATK)
effectsNote:
The multiplier per hit for this attack is given by the following formula:

(1+min((1/(1+exp(-ATK/1000*3.95))*2-1)*4.30;4.26))*0.27

It has a minimum of 0.27x and caps at 1.42x at around 1358 ATK.

name: Renzokuken
effects: Five group attacks (0.92~1.10 scaling with targets)
effectsNote:
The multiplier for this attack is given by the following formula, where X is the number of targets:

(92+(110-92 *exp(-(X-1)*0.60))/100

The minimum multiplier is 0.92, and never goes higher than 1.10.

name: Soul Burn
effects: Four single attacks (0.70~1.20 each scaling with HP%)
effectsNote:
The multiplier for this attack is given by the following formula, where X is the HP% of the user:

min(exp(-1*(X-1)*200/10000)*(1.20-0.70)+0.70;1.20)

The minimum multiplier is 0.70, and is capped at 1.20 at 1% HP.

name: Armor Strike
effects: One single attack (2.80), damage scales with both ATK and DEF
effectsNote:
This ability essentially works like a normal physical attack, but uses the following formula instead of the user's ATK:

0.3*TotalATK + 0.7*BaseDEF*min((TotalDEF/BaseDEF)^0.18; 1.8)

DEF buffs increase only slightly the damage of this skill. The hard cap is reached at around DEF x27.
